animeTitle: Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Juuni Kyuu-hen - Yomigaerishi Gold Saint-tachi no Shinwa
animeDescription: Is a summary of the Saga Hades Sanctuary from the perspective of the golden knights resurrected, especially Shura, Camus and Saga.
animeCharacters: ['Gemini, Saga', 'Aquarius, Camus', 'Aries, Muu', 'Capricorn, Shura', 'Phoenix, Ikki', 'Dragon, Shiryuu', 'Pegasus, Seiya', 'Virgo, Shaka', 'Andromeda, Shun', 'Cygnus, Hyouga']
animeStaff: [['Yamauchi Shigeyasu', ['Director']], ['Matsuzawa Yumi', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kurumada Masami', ['Original Creator']], ['Baroli Hermes', ['ADR Director']]]
